author: Kareena Kapoor Khan
content: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.

author: Kelly Clarkson
content: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
content: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.

author: Helen Keller
content: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
content: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.

author: Ben Carson
content: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.

author: Mother Teresa
content: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

author: Garth Brooks
content: Stand straight, walk proud, have a little faith.

author: George Washington
content: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.

author: Voltaire
content: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.

author: George Herbert
content: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night.

author: Khalil Gibran
content: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.

author: Steve Jobs
content: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.

author: Mary McLeod Bethune
content: Without faith, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.

author: Louisa May Alcott
content: Happy is the son whose faith in his mother remains unchallenged.

author: William Penn
content: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.

author: Saint Augustine
content: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
content: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it.

author: Edwin Louis Cole
content: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief.

author: Masi Oka
content: Anyone can be a hero. You just have to have faith in yourself.

author: Martin Luther
content: Pray, and let God worry.

author: Steve Jobs
content: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people.

author: Dwight L. Moody
content: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.

author: Plato
content: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.

author: J. R. R. Tolkien
content: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.

author: Alexis de Tocqueville
content: Liberty cannot be established without morality, nor morality without faith.

author: Miguel de Unamuno
content: It is truer to say that martyrs create faith more than faith creates martyrs.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.

author: William Wordsworth
content: Faith is a passionate intuition.

author: Martin Luther
content: Faith is permitting ourselves to be seized by the things we do not see.

author: C. S. Lewis
content: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.

author: Khalil Gibran
content: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.

author: Jonathan Edwards
content: Prayer is as natural an expression of faith as breathing is of life.

author: Owen D. Young
content: It takes vision and courage to create - it takes faith and courage to prove.

author: George Edward Moore
content: Faith goes out through the window when beauty comes in at the door.

author: William Shakespeare
content: The love of heaven makes one heavenly.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Non-violence is the article of faith.

author: Anne Frank
content: He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery!

author: Ronald Reagan
content: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.

author: George W. Bush
content: Faith crosses every border and touches every heart in every nation.

author: Maajid Nawaz
content: Unity in faith is theocracy; unity in politics is fascism.

author: Elizabeth I
content: Do not tell secrets to those whose faith and silence you have not already tested.

author: Victor Hugo
content: A library implies an act of faith.

author: Paula Abdul
content: Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut extinct.

author: Vin Scully
content: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God.

author: Michelangelo
content: I live and love in God's peculiar light.

author: Oliver Cromwell
content: Keep your faith in God, but keep your powder dry.

author: Elbert Hubbard
content: Love, we say, is life; but love without hope and faith is agonizing death.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
content: It's faith in something and enthusiasm for something that makes a life worth living.

author: Flannery O'Connor
content: Faith is what someone knows to be true, whether they believe it or not.

author: Erich Fromm
content: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.

author: Albert Einstein
content: God always takes the simplest way.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Faith: not wanting to know what is true.

author: Bruce Springsteen
content: Blind faith in your leaders, or in anything, will get you killed.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.

author: Ellen G. White
content: The great moral powers of the soul are faith, hope, and love.

author: Sean Bean
content: Sometimes all you need is a big leap of faith.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
content: Painting is a faith, and it imposes the duty to disregard public opinion.

author: Ann Jillian
content: I wish everybody finds the serenity that good, strong faith brings.

author: Joseph Campbell
content: I don't have to have faith, I have experience.

author: Edwin Louis Cole
content: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God.

author: Denzel Washington
content: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace.

author: Christina Rossetti
content: Obedience is the fruit of faith.

author: Michelangelo
content: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.

author: Thomas Paine
content: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man.

author: Billy Graham
content: Believers, look up - take courage. The angels are nearer than you think.

author: Taylor Swift
content: I spend a lot of time balancing between faith and disbelief.

author: Ben Stein
content: Faith is not believing that God can. It is knowing that God will.

author: Pope Benedict XVI
content: An Adult faith does not follow the waves of fashion and the latest novelties.

author: Joel Osteen
content: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Each one prays to God according to his own light.

author: William Shakespeare
content: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into.

author: Gregory Peck
content: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.

author: Martin Luther
content: Faith must trample under foot all reason, sense, and understanding.

author: Margo Price
content: Sometimes you find your strongest faith in the darkest corners.

author: Mason Cooley
content: Faith moves mountains, but you have to keep pushing while you are praying.

author: Taylor Swift
content: Faith Hill is a big role model.

author: Darryl Glenn
content: I'm a strong man of faith.

author: Martin Luther
content: Be a sinner and sin strongly, but more strongly have faith and rejoice in Christ.

author: Douglas MacArthur
content: A better world shall emerge based on faith and understanding.

author: Martin Luther
content: Reason is the enemy of faith.

author: H. L. Mencken
content: Faith may be defined briefly as an illogical belief in the occurrence of the improbable.

author: R. Buckminster Fuller
content: Faith is much better than belief. Belief is when someone else does the thinking.

author: Ayn Rand
content: God... a being whose only definition is that he is beyond man's power to conceive.

author: John Donne
content: Reason is our soul's left hand, faith her right.

author: John Greenleaf Whittier
content: When faith is lost, when honor dies, the man is dead.

author: Deepak Chopra
content: I have tremendous faith in President Obama's skills. He's a long-term visionary.

author: John Calvin
content: Is it faith to understand nothing, and merely submit your convictions implicitly to the Church?

author: Miguel de Unamuno
content: Faith which does not doubt is dead faith.

author: Aretha Franklin
content: My faith always has been and always will be important to me.

author: Michele Bachmann
content: Morals are built on religious faith. Virtue is built on morality and influences a culture.

author: Edwin Louis Cole
content: Faith is the ticket to the feast, not the feast.

author: Romain Rolland
content: Skepticism, riddling the faith of yesterday, prepared the way for the faith of tomorrow.

author: George MacDonald
content: The principle part of faith is patience.

author: Ron Suskind
content: The substance of faith is a hope in the unseen.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: God enters by a private door into every individual.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: The faith that stands on authority is not faith.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Our faith comes in moments; our vice is habitual.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Faith... must be enforced by reason... when faith becomes blind it dies.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: The way to see by Faith is to shut the Eye of Reason.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: Faith never makes a confession.

author: E. B. White
content: Writing is an act of faith, not a trick of grammar.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Intolerance betrays want of faith in one's cause.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: But for my faith in God, I should have been a raving maniac.

author: Dalai Lama
content: My faith helps me overcome such negative emotions and find my equilibrium.

author: Paul Tillich
content: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.

author: Barack Obama
content: You know, my faith is one that admits some doubt.

author: Voltaire
content: To believe in God is impossible not to believe in Him is absurd.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
content: A man of courage is also full of faith.

author: Thomas Carlyle
content: Not brute force but only persuasion and faith are the kings of this world.

author: Viktor E. Frankl
content: Faith is trust in ultimate meaning.

author: Norman Cousins
content: My reason nourishes my faith and my faith my reason.

author: Joel Osteen
content: Faith is easy; I think people complicate it.

author: William Hazlitt
content: If you think you can win, you can win. Faith is necessary to victory.

author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
content: There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds.

author: Joel Osteen
content: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.

author: Alan Watts
content: Faith is a state of openness or trust.

author: Hans Urs von Balthasar
content: Even if a unity of faith is not possible, a unity of love is.

author: Thomas Browne
content: As reason is a rebel to faith, so passion is a rebel to reason.

author: Joel Osteen
content: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.

author: Ravi Zacharias
content: I am totally convinced the Christian faith is the most coherent worldview around.

author: Barry Commoner
content: The age of innocent faith in science and technology may be over.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
content: The greatest act of faith is when a man understands he is not God.

author: Ayrton Senna
content: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.

author: Dwight L. Moody
content: God never made a promise that was too good to be true.

author: Jason Statham
content: There's a huge amount of faith and confidence in the stunt team.

author: Miguel de Unamuno
content: Life is doubt, and faith without doubt is nothing but death.

author: Thomas More
content: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.

author: J. William Fulbright
content: In a democracy, dissent is an act of faith.

author: George Gurdjieff
content: If you want to lose your faith, make friends with a priest.

author: Blaise Pascal
content: Faith embraces many truths which seem to contradict each other.

author: Victor Hugo
content: A faith is a necessity to a man. Woe to him who believes in nothing.

author: Jimmy Carter
content: You just have to have a simple faith.

author: Joyce Meyer
content: Our faith is released as we say, pray and do the Word.

author: Charles Stanley
content: He wants you all to Himself to put His loving, divine arms around you.

author: William James
content: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible.

author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
content: That willing suspension of disbelief for the moment, which constitutes poetic faith.

author: Billy Graham
content: I can't prove it scientifically, that there's a God, but I believe.

author: Thomas S. Monson
content: The future is as bright as your faith.

author: John Dewey
content: To me faith means not worrying.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
content: Only our individual faith in freedom can keep us free.

author: Emily Bronte
content: I see heaven's glories shine and faith shines equal.

author: Deepak Chopra
content: Science stands for rational thought, faith for superstition and unreason.

author: Elbert Hubbard
content: Fear clogs; faith liberates.

author: Faith Evans
content: Faith is not a sense, nor sight, nor reason, but taking God at His work.

author: Gustave Flaubert
content: Art requires neither complaisance nor politeness; nothing but faith, faith and freedom.

author: Charles Henry Parkhurst
content: Faith is the heroism of the intellect.

author: Tim Tebow
content: It's attractive when girls have faith. That is a big thing for me.

author: Paul Tillich
content: Faith is the state of being ultimately concerned.

author: Bethenny Frankel
content: Faith, culture, structure and guidance are good things.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Duty cannot exist without faith.

author: Wilma Mankiller
content: I want to be remembered as the person who helped us restore faith in ourselves.

author: John Ortberg
content: At the heart of Christian faith is the story of Jesus' death and resurrection.

author: Steve-O
content: My main focus in sobriety has been to replace fear with faith or love.

author: Novalis
content: Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other.

author: Joe Bob Briggs
content: Faith is like a kernel of wheat.
